Falcon's Fire Golf Club
3200 Seralago Boulevard
Kissimmee, FL 34746
Phone: (407) 239-5445
Get Directions

The Orender Service Award
.
Click Here to Nominate a Team Member.

General Information
Phone: (407) 239-5445

Falcon’s Fire Golf Club is recognized both regionally and nationally as one of the finest
public Golf Courses in Orlando.
This Rees Jones designed championship Golf Course and the spacious Clubhouse offer Guests a spectacular venue for any occasion. From an immaculate Golf Course featuring the highest level of service and amenities, to the exquisite dining at the Falcon’s Nest Restaurant, to the latest technology, equipment, and apparel at the award-winning Golf Shop, Falcon’s Fire Golf Club is a premier Florida golf destination, conveniently located just steps from the Walt Disney World Resort, Orlando International Airport, and the Orange County Convention Center.
Offering a variety of Florida golf vacation packages, you’re invited to experience the flawless craftsmanship and unparalleled service and amenities at this award-winning Orlando Golf Course. This championship Golf Course features classic architecture, an exquisitely maintained course, and year-round playing conditions. Stretching over 7,000 yards from the back tees and providing golfers four sets of tees to choose from, Falcon’s Fire offers a challenging yet playable course for a relaxing round with friends or a
competitive tournament
. In addition to the course, guests can take advantage of the
state-of-the-art driving range
to perfect their swing. All Guests enjoy complimentary club cleaning and golf carts equipped with GPS navigation. Additionally, we have special Florida golf vacation packages sure to meet anyone’s needs, so be sure to ask any Team Member for more details!
View / Download Scorecard

Host Your Corporate, Team-Building, or Special Event at Falcon’s Fire Golf Club
Falcon’s Fire Golf Club celebrates the Club’s successful history of hosting organization and corporate events for almost 3 decades in beautiful Kissimmee, Florida. Over the years the Club has welcomed a variety of organization types. Casual, formal, and professional events at Falcon’s Fire Golf Club succeed because your satisfaction and peace of mind are our top priority.
The Club accommodates a variety of events for organizations. Speaking events, luncheons, dinners, board meetings, panels, conferences, charity events and more are executed with a professional Team Members committed to creating a memorable experience. The Club is uniquely able to accommodate a large Guest list, up to 250 people. Our convenient location is close to Disney, the Orlando airport, and I-4, making it a perfect meeting place for groups of all kinds.
A Premier Venue for Corporate and Organizational Events:
Fraternity/Sorority
Non-profits
Corporate
Management
Clubs and Groups
Your next organization event
Why choose Falcon’s Fire Golf Club as your organization's event venue?
Location
The Club’s convenient and central location means everyone in your organization will have a short drive to the venue. With a location merely minutes away from Walt Disney World and I-4, it’s also an easy destination for out of town Guests.
Ambiance
The Club’s event venue was designed to accommodate all types of events, and is unique in its ability to easily transform into a great place to host your organization’s event. The venue’s décor is classically inspired, and our spacious ballroom is suitable for up to 200 or more Guests, dependent on setup needs.
Culinary Expertise
Falcon’s Fire Golf Club offers you the option of in-house catering for any event hosted at the Club. The Club provides tables, chairs, linens, and silverware. The Meals are custom designed by the Head Chef, and promises to impress with the extensive menu options.
Audio Visual Capabilities
The venue is designed to accommodate your audio visual needs, speakers, sound systems, visual displays. If you require special equipment the Club will coordinate for you.
Setup, Serving and Cleanup
The Falcon’s Fire Team will take care of preparation for your event. The Club will also provide wait staff to present your meals, and clean up once your Guests have left, freeing you up to focus on creating the best experience for your Guests.
Parking
The Club offers ample space for your Guests to park on-site. The lot is just a short walk to the venue, and the Club offers the option for valet service. Treat your Guests to the full luxury event experience with our valet option.
Accessibility
The event venue is ADA compliant and is able to accommodate those with special needs.
Request Information

SharpSpring Form for Weddings & Events

The Premier Events Venue in Orlando & Kissimmee – Perfect for Weddings, Corporate Events, and More
Falcon’s Fire provides a beautiful setting for a variety of special events, including bridal showers & baby showers, birthday parties, anniversary parties and much more! Highlighting our elegantly decorated special event space is a stunning outdoor terrace which overlooks our award winning Golf Course and is an ideal location for a cocktail reception or luncheon.
Our professional Team Members will ensure that your special event exceeds your expectations while providing your Guests with a memorable experience.
Perfect Venue for Weddings, Business Meetings, and More
Whether you're planning a romantic wedding, a corporate event, or a milestone celebration, Falcon's Fire Golf Club offers the ideal setting. Our versatile spaces cater to a variety of occasions, ensuring your event is memorable and flawlessly executed.
Elegant Indoor and Outdoor Spaces Overlooking Our Award-Winning Golf Course
Enjoy the beauty of our elegantly designed event spaces, both indoors and outdoors, with stunning views of our award-winning golf course. From intimate ceremonies to grand receptions, our venue provides the perfect backdrop for your special day.
Here is just a sampling of some of the events that we have held at Falcon’s Fire Golf Club:
Weddings/Vow Renewals
Quinceanera
Baby Shower
Birthday Celebrations
Anniversary Celebrations
Corporate Celebrations
Seminars
Networking Events
Request Information
